verses.name: 1 Timothy 4:10
verses.text: For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach, because we trust in the living God, who is the Saviour of all men, specially of those that believe.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 4:12
verses.text: Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the believers, in word, in conversation, in charity, in spirit, in faith, in purity.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 4:13
verses.text: Till I come, give attendance to reading, to exhortation, to doctrine.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 4:14
verses.text: Neglect not the gift that is in thee, which was given thee by prophecy, with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery.
